content.heading: To Bitoni
content.paragraph: is a channel for publishing collective masterpieces / creations In each issue of Bitoni/bitoniou/bitoniera-mixer you will find some creative washouts on unique, independent themes that will at least fascinate you, take you and lift you up. It was created by a group of friends who wanted to share their eyeglasses with the rest of the world. We offer them to you to wear / we wear them to you, offer them.

zines_page.title: Zines
zines_page.description: All issues from To Bitoni magazine

content.heading: About
content.p1: Bitoni is a collective, electronic (and not only) magazine that It is issued seasonally. On Bitoni's website you will find the issues uploaded of the magazine. Each issue is dedicated to a unique / different theme. The material you will find in the issues ranges from prose texts & fairy tales, graphic design and poems, potatoes, tomatoes, cool lettuce and musical chairs. The greengrocers in your neighborhood who create, compile and generously offer you this magazine is A group of friends consisting of:

content.heading: Contact
content.p1: The magazine is available online and can be downloaded for free.... If you want you can contribute for future printing of the magazine and the cost of the website.
content.p2: For more announcements and updates, follow us at FB, Insta and subscribe to our newsletter:
